tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RouteOptimization (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  start_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  end_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  distance FLOAT NOT NULL,
  traffic_conditions VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  time_estimate INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_patterns (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_location VARCHAR(255),
    end_location VARCHAR(255),
    traffic_intensity INT
);

CREATE TABLE route_history (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT REFERENCES traffic_patterns(id),
    date_recorded DATE,
    average_speed INT,
    traffic_delay INT
);

CREATE TABLE road_segments (
  segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  start_point_id INT,
  end_point_id INT,
  traffic_data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(50),
  start_point_id INT,
  end_point_id INT,
  distance FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_incidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  incident_type VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE historical_traffic_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  segment_id INT,
  date DATE,
  average_speed FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE RouteOptimizationSystem (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    end_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    traffic_pattern_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE RouteHistory (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT REFERENCES RouteOptimizationSystem(route_id),
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    start_time TIME NOT NULL,
    end_time TIME NOT NULL,
    traffic_conditions JSONB
);
